concept.title: What is a Data Collector?
concept.shortdesc: The is a lightweight, powerful engine that streams data in real time. Use the to route and process data in your data streams.

conbody.p: Data CollectordescriptionTo define the flow of data for the , you configure a pipeline. A pipeline consists of stages that represent the origin and destination of the pipeline, and any additional processing that you want to perform. After you configure the pipeline, you click Start, and the goes to work.

The processes data when it arrives at the origin and waits quietly when not needed. You can view real-time statistics about your data, inspect data as it passes through the pipeline, or take a close look at a snapshot of data.
